response.original_title: 2022 Oscar Nominated Short Films- Live Action
response.overview: FINAL LINE-UP:  On My Mind – Martin Strange-Hansen and Kim Magnusson, Denmark, 18 min.  Please Hold – K.D. Dávila and Levin Menekse, USA, 19 min.  The Dress – Tadeusz Łysiak and Maciej Ślesicki, Poland, 30 min.  The Long Goodbye – Aneil Karia and Riz Ahmed, UK/Netherlands, 12 min.  Ala Kachuu - Take and Run – Maria Brendle and Nadine Lüchinger, Kyrgyzstan/Switzerland, 38 min.
response.title: 2022 Oscar Nominated Short Films- Live Action
